content: Act as an intelligence analyst, your task is to generate a summary of the interaction logs of a user who was trying to investigate an event in the intelligence domain. The logs are written in sentences. The entire interaction is divided into 11 segments. You will be summarizing the entire interaction session step by step by summarizing one segment at a time. When you are summarizing a segment, make sure you take into account summaries of previous segments. Please summarize a segment in at most 100 words with a focus on arms dealing. The goal is to communicate findings and progress in a collaborative investigation scenario.

Summarize the sentences describing the interactions of segment 1 delimited by triple backticks in at most 100 words. Make sure you take into account summaries of previous segments. Description: ```segment 1```

The user started investigating the origin of a disease that spread to multiple countries. They decided to focus on identifying the disease first and then investigating arms dealing in the affected countries. They read documents related to arms dealing in Nigeria and highlighted the name "FUNSHO KAPOLALUM." They also searched for gun dealers in Nigeria and Kenya and found a blog post about the recovery of 150 guns in Kenya. They searched for the origin of the guns and started reading a new document about guns in Kenya.

Summarize the sentences describing the interactions of segment 2 delimited by triple backticks in at most 100 words. Make sure you take into account summaries of previous segments. Description: ```The user searched for kenya, dragged over document armsdealing98, thought aloud Puts document aside. Picks another one (from kenya search)., searched for gun, opened document armsdealing100, read document armsdealing100, searched for nigeria, thought aloud trying to search two words at the same time. but no results, searched for nigeria gun, searched for nigeria + gun, searched for nigeria, read document armsdealing100, dragged over document armsdealing100, dragged over document armsdealing84, opened document armsdealing84, read document armsdealing84, thought aloud Since there are many guns documents I'm want to search for Nigeria first and then see if ther is any gun in there, searched for gun, searched for nigeria, searched for gun, dragged over document armsdealing65, thought aloud Picks a document that has both Nigeria and gun, dragged over document armsdealing65, opened document armsdealing65, read document armsdealing65, read document armsdealing65, searched for nigeria, searched for gun, read document armsdealing65, thought aloud so this one is from Newyork timee and it's from Feb 1st 2002 which is similar to start date of desease in Nigeria theother article, read document armsdealing65, highlighted February 1, 2009 in document armsdealing65, read document armsdealing65, thought aloud Still reading the document, thought aloud It's talking about some international gus smogler in Milan. Says police came to his hotel room and interupted a party and arrested him, thought aloud Now I'm trying to find a connection between Nigeria smogler and the disease, searched for nigeria, read document armsdealing65, thought aloud Still reading the document, opened document armsdealing97, thought aloud Going back to an old document, thought aloud Going back to another old document, mouse hovered over armsdealing79, opened document armsdealing79, thought aloud returning to reading the current doccument, thought aloud still reading the same document, thought aloud It's saying that police found several evidences of arms deals. So I think this guy was doing some arms deals between Nigeria and Kenya, dragged over document armsdealing65, dragged over document armsdealing65, dragged over document armsdealing65, connected armsdealing65,promptnote, mouse hovered over armsdealing79, thought aloud Also connecting to another document. maybe here cause I'm not sure but lets just connect it, connected armsdealing65,armsdealing79, mouse hovered over armsdealing97, dragged over document armsdealing65, mouse hovered over armsdealing97, opened document armsdealing97, searched for gun, thought aloud Picks a document that has both Nigeria and gun, opened document armsdealing91, read document armsdealing91, read document armsdealing91, mouse hovered over armsdealing72, dragged over document armsdealing72, opened document armsdealing72, read document armsdealing72, thought aloud That's the same article. oh. No. times are different. lets see, opened document armsdealing72, read document armsdealing72, opened document armsdealing65, read document armsdealing72, read document armsdealing72, searched for nigeria, read document armsdealing72, thought aloud Looks most of information are the same, dragged over document armsdealing72, mouse hovered over armsdealing65, mouse hovered over armsdealing72,```
